General.Name: Intan Baruprana Finance Tbk
General.Description: PT Intan Baru Prana Tbk operates as a finance company in Indonesia. It also engages in the sale and leaseback financing activities. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Intan Baru Prana Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Intraco Penta Tbk.
